hero.title: About AIChE NTU
hero.subtitle: Learn more about our mission, vision, and the passionate team behind our student chapter.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To advance the chemical engineering profession and its practitioners by fostering lifelong learning, leadership development, and professional excellence among NTU students.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the premier chemical engineering student organization that bridges academia and industry, creating future leaders in chemical engineering.

hero.title: Join AIChE NTU
hero.subtitle: Become part of our vibrant community of chemical engineering students and unlock opportunities for growth, networking, and innovation.
